short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Copy or reveal password fields with a click.
short.de: Kopieren oder enthüllen Sie Passwortfelder mit einem Klick.
short.fr: Copiez ou révélez des champs de mot de passe d'un clic.
short.he: העתק או חשוף שדות סיסמאות בלחיצה.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
PassSnap is a Chrome extension that allows you to copy or reveal password fields on any webpage with a single click.

Features:
- Copy Passwords: Easily copy passwords from hidden fields to your clipboard.
- Reveal Passwords: Instantly reveal masked password fields.
- Copy and Reveal: Combine both functionalities to copy and reveal passwords simultaneously.
- Customizable Actions: Choose between copying, revealing, or both.
- Disable for Specific Pages/Domains: Disable the extension for specific pages or entire domains.

Benefits:
- Increased Productivity: Save time by managing passwords more efficiently.
- User-Friendly: Intuitive design and easy-to-use interface.
- Secure: PassSnap does not store or transmit your passwords.

Install PassSnap to enhance your browsing experience and manage your passwords effortlessly.
